name: Shoreline Scrapper
description: The Shoreline Scrapper is a large beast with a tough exterior, covered in a magnetic shell that can immobilize metal objects and creatures nearby. It has powerful claws for melee attacks and a robust physique.
memorable: Its ability to control metal items and creatures around it creates a unique battlefield dynamic.
goals: Hindering enemies and dominating coastal environments.
relations: May be encountered with other coastal creatures, particularly those adapted to aquatic life.
environment: Typically found in coastal areas where land meets water.
strengths: Good physical power, substantial resilience, and strong area control through its unique magnetic abilities.
weaknesses: Low intelligence and charisma, making it poor at strategy and social interaction.
attacks: Capable of making two claw attacks in a single turn, dealing significant slashing damage, alongside its Magnetic Pulse that restrains and pulls opponents.
most_powerful_ability: Magnetic Shell, which restrains metal-wearing creatures and objects within its vicinity.
senses: Can detect the location of metal objects within 60 feet through its Metal Sense ability.
skills: Possesses a basic survival skill that aids it in its natural coastal habitat.
additional_information: Breathes air and water, allowing it to thrive both underwater and on land.
Items made of gold and silver are unaffected by its Magnetic Shell ability.
Can temporarily increase its Armor Class by retracting into its shell as a defensive measure.
A strong presence on the battlefield due to its control tactics.
Effective against metal-wearing foes due to its unique abilities.
test_queries: large creature that immobilizes metal items
strong claw attacks and magnetic control
marine beast that can breathe underwater
creature that hinders enemies with magnetic shell
